A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Things I liked about this movie:
1.  The music
2.  The fight scene in Snoke's chambers

Things I hated in this movie:
1. Flying Leia
2.  Corny humor
3. Luke attempting to kill his nephew in his sleep
4. The whole Canto Bight scene
5.  The leftist propaganda throughout the movie
6.  The new girl character with Fin in Canto Bight - she is boring
7.  Luke milking an elephant/walrus
8.  Snoke's lame death
9. The explanation of who Rey's parents were
10. Luke's demise
11.  Luke tossing his lightsaber over his shoulder
12. New girl crashing her speeder into Fin's to prevent his sacrifice
13. New girl's incredibly cheesey line about saving what we love
14. Not enough BB8\, C3P0 or R2D2
15. Running out of gas...really?
16.  Who was Snoke?
17.  Why didn't purple-haired lady tell Poe the plan?
18. Prank call/your mama "joke"
19 Rey has no training and yet she uses the force like a jedi master
20. Kylo Ren's shirtless scene
21. Not enough Chewbacca
22.  Obvious attempt at a diverse cast jsut for the sake of a diverse cast

Those are the things that came off the top of my head.  I could go on but that's enough.  It pains me to say this\, but that was the worst movie I've seen in a long time.  Disney\, I would like a refund.
